comments.body:
@simedw I've inspected the darwin-py source to try to reduce this list to the actually in-use dependencies, as you're more familiar with this, could you please confirm this looks right?

The torch and detectron2 dependencies are currently left out, as it seems to me those are optional.
It would be ideal to fix the upstream issue and uncomment this going forward to ensure CI can catch any dependency changes for us.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +42,46 @@  commands:
    # disabled because upstream setup.py needs fixing https://github.com/v7labs/darwin-py/issues/144
    # - pip check
    - darwin --help
  requires:
